alert.note: Alert for Polk (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued September 04 at 11:48PM EDT until further notice by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 145 AM EDT MONDAY... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of central Florida, including the following county, Polk. * WHEN...Until 145 AM EDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1148 PM EDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. This will cause urban and small stream flooding. Between 2 and 4 inches of rain have fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts of 1 to 2 inches are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Winter Haven, Bartow, Lake Wales, Auburndale, Jan Phyl Village, Fort Meade, Lake Alfred, Eagle Lake, Wahneta, Bartow Municipal Airport, Cypress Gardens, Inwood, Winter Haven Airport and Lake Wales Municipal Airport. - https://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
